AddAutoCcBlacklist.title: AddAutoCcBlacklist
AddAutoCcBlacklist.summary: Adds IP addresses to the IP address blacklist of an Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance.

AddAutoCcWhitelist.summary: Adds IP addresses to the IP address whitelist of an Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance.

AssociateWebCert.title: AssociateWebCert
AssociateWebCert.summary: Associates an SSL certificate with the forwarding rule of a website.

AttachSceneDefenseObject.title: AttachSceneDefenseObject
AttachSceneDefenseObject.summary: Adds an object to a scenario-specific custom policy for protection.

ConfigDomainSecurityProfile.title: ConfigDomainSecurityProfile
ConfigDomainSecurityProfile.summary: Configures the global mitigation policy feature, including the feature status and settings.

ConfigL7GlobalRule.title: ConfigL7GlobalRule
ConfigL7GlobalRule.summary: Configures an Anti-DDoS global mitigation policy.

ConfigL7RsPolicy.title: ConfigL7RsPolicy
ConfigL7RsPolicy.summary: Configures a back-to-origin policy for the forwarding rule of a website.

ConfigL7UsKeepalive.title: ConfigL7UsKeepalive
ConfigL7UsKeepalive.summary: Configures the settings for back-to-origin persistent connections for a domain name.

ConfigLayer4Remark.title: ConfigLayer4Remark
ConfigLayer4Remark.summary: Adds a description to a port forwarding rule.

ConfigLayer4RuleBakMode.title: ConfigLayer4RuleBakMode
ConfigLayer4RuleBakMode.summary: Enables or disables the origin redundancy mode for a port forwarding rule.

ConfigLayer4RulePolicy.title: ConfigLayer4RulePolicy
ConfigLayer4RulePolicy.summary: Configures the IP addresses of the primary and secondary origin servers for a port forwarding rule.

ConfigNetworkRegionBlock.title: ConfigNetworkRegionBlock
ConfigNetworkRegionBlock.summary: Configures blocked locations for an Anti-DDoS Proxy instance.

ConfigNetworkRules.title: ConfigNetworkRules
ConfigNetworkRules.summary: Modifies the IP addresses of the origin server that is configured in a port forwarding rule.

ConfigUdpReflect.title: ConfigUdpReflect
ConfigUdpReflect.summary: Adds the filtering policies for UDP reflection attacks on an Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance to filter out the source ports of UDP traffic.

ConfigWebCCRuleV2.title: ConfigWebCCRuleV2
ConfigWebCCRuleV2.summary: Creates or modifies the custom frequency control rule of a website.

ConfigWebCCTemplate.summary: Configures the mode of the Frequency Control policy for a website.

ConfigWebIpSet.title: ConfigWebIpSet
ConfigWebIpSet.summary: Configures the IP address whitelist and blacklist for a website.

CreateAsyncTask.title: CreateAsyncTask
CreateAsyncTask.summary: Creates an asynchronous export task to export forwarding rules for websites, port forwarding rules, session persistence and health check settings, DDoS mitigation policies, the IP address blacklist, or the IP address whitelist.

CreateDomainResource.title: CreateDomainResource
CreateDomainResource.summary: Creates a forwarding rule for a website.

CreateSchedulerRule.title: CreateSchedulerRule
CreateSchedulerRule.summary: Creates a scheduling rule for Sec-Traffic Manager.

CreateTagResources.title: CreateTagResources
CreateTagResources.summary: Adds tags to multiple Anti-DDoS Proxy instances at a time.

CreateWebCCRule.title: CreateWebCCRule
CreateWebCCRule.summary: Creates a custom frequency control rule for a website.

CreateWebRule.summary: Creates a forwarding rule for a website.

DeleteAutoCcBlacklist.title: DeleteAutoCcBlacklist
DeleteAutoCcBlacklist.summary: Removes IP addresses from the IP address blacklist of an Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance.

DeleteAutoCcWhitelist.title: DeleteAutoCcWhitelist
DeleteAutoCcWhitelist.summary: Removes IP addresses from the IP address whitelist of an Anti-DDoS Proxy instance.

DeleteDomainResource.summary: Deletes a specified forwarding rule of a website.

DeleteNetworkRule.title: DeleteNetworkRule
DeleteNetworkRule.summary: Deletes a port forwarding rule. You can delete only one port forwarding rule at a time.

DeletePort.title: DeletePort
DeletePort.summary: Deletes the specified port forwarding rule.

DeleteSchedulerRule.title: DeleteSchedulerRule
DeleteSchedulerRule.summary: Deletes a scheduling rule of Sec-Traffic Manager.

DeleteTagResources.title: DeleteTagResources
DeleteTagResources.summary: Removes tags from Anti-DDoS Proxy (Chinese Mainland) instances.

DeleteWebCCRule.title: DeleteWebCCRule
DeleteWebCCRule.summary: Deletes a custom frequency control rule of a website.

DeleteWebCCRuleV2.title: DeleteWebCCRuleV2
DeleteWebCCRuleV2.summary: Deletes custom frequency control rules of a website.

DeleteWebCacheCustomRule.title: DeleteWebCacheCustomRule
DeleteWebCacheCustomRule.summary: Deletes the custom rules of the Static Page Caching policy for a website.

DeleteWebPreciseAccessRule.title: DeleteWebPreciseAccessRule
DeleteWebPreciseAccessRule.summary: Deletes the accurate access control rules that are created for a website.

DeleteWebRule.title: DeleteWebRule
DeleteWebRule.summary: Deletes a forwarding rule of a website.

DescribeAsyncTasks.summary: Queries the details of asynchronous export tasks, such as the IDs, start time, end time, status, parameters, and results.

DescribeAttackAnalysisMaxQps.summary: Queries the peak QPS of DDoS attacks within the specific period of time.

DescribeAutoCcBlacklist.title: DescribeAutoCcBlacklist
DescribeAutoCcBlacklist.summary: Queries IP addresses in the IP address blacklist of an Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance.

DescribeAutoCcListCount.title: DescribeAutoCcListCount
DescribeAutoCcListCount.summary: Queries the numbers of IP addresses in the IP address whitelist and IP address blacklist of an Anti-DDoS Proxy instance.

DescribeAutoCcWhitelist.title: DescribeAutoCcWhitelist
DescribeAutoCcWhitelist.summary: Queries IP addresses in the IP address whitelist of an Anti-DDoS Proxy instance.

DescribeBackSourceCidr.title: DescribeBackSourceCidr
DescribeBackSourceCidr.summary: Queries the back-to-origin CIDR blocks of Anti-DDoS Proxy.

DescribeBlackholeStatus.summary: Queries the blackhole filtering status of one or more Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instances.

DescribeBlockStatus.title: DescribeBlockStatus
DescribeBlockStatus.summary: Queries the Diversion from Origin Server configurations of one or more Anti-DDoS Proxy (Chinese Mainland) instances.

DescribeCerts.title: DescribeCerts
DescribeCerts.summary: Queries information about all certificates that can be associated with the current domain name instead of the certificate currently in use.

DescribeCnameReuses.title: DescribeCnameReuses
DescribeCnameReuses.summary: Queries the CNAME reuse information about websites.

DescribeDDoSEvents.title: DescribeDDoSEvents
DescribeDDoSEvents.summary: Queries the attack events launched against one or more Anti-DDoS Proxy instances.

DescribeDDosEventArea.title: DescribeDDosEventArea
DescribeDDosEventArea.summary: Queries the source region from which a volumetric attack is initiated.

DescribeDDosEventAttackType.title: DescribeDDosEventAttackType
DescribeDDosEventAttackType.summary: Queries the attack type details of a volumetric attack.

DescribeDDosEventIsp.title: DescribeDDosEventIsp
DescribeDDosEventIsp.summary: Queries the Internet service provider (ISP) information about a volumetric attack.

DescribeDDosEventMax.title: DescribeDDosEventMax
DescribeDDosEventMax.summary: Queries the peaks of volumetric attacks (bit/s), connection flood attacks (CPS), and resource exhaustion attacks on websites (QPS).

DescribeDDosEventSrcIp.title: DescribeDDosEventSrcIp
DescribeDDosEventSrcIp.summary: Queries the source IP address from which a volumetric attack is initiated.

DescribeDefenseCountStatistics.title: DescribeDefenseCountStatistics
DescribeDefenseCountStatistics.summary: Queries the statistics on advanced mitigation sessions of an Anti-DDoS Proxy (Outside Chinese Mainland) instance.

DescribeDefenseRecords.title: DescribeDefenseRecords
DescribeDefenseRecords.summary: Queries the advanced mitigation logs of an Anti-DDoS Proxy (Outside Chinese Mainland) instance.

DescribeDestinationPortEvent.title: DescribeDestinationPortEvent
DescribeDestinationPortEvent.summary: Queries the number of request packets received by the destination ports of the attacked IP address that is protected by Anti-DDoS Proxy.

DescribeDomainAttackEvents.title: DescribeDomainAttackEvents
DescribeDomainAttackEvents.summary: Queries the attack events launched against a website.

DescribeDomainBps.title: DescribeDomainBps
DescribeDomainBps.summary: Queries the bandwidths of a website.

DescribeDomainH2Fingerprint.title: DescribeDomainH2Fingerprint
DescribeDomainH2Fingerprint.summary: Queries the information about HTTP/2 fingerprints of a website.

DescribeDomainOverview.title: DescribeDomainOverview
DescribeDomainOverview.summary: Queries the attack overview of a website, such as the peak HTTP and HTTPS traffic.

DescribeDomainQPSList.title: DescribeDomainQPSList
DescribeDomainQPSList.summary: Queries the statistics on the queries per second (QPS) of a website.

DescribeDomainResource.title: DescribeDomainResource
DescribeDomainResource.summary: Queries the configurations of a forwarding rule.

DescribeDomainStatusCodeCount.title: DescribeDomainStatusCodeCount
DescribeDomainStatusCodeCount.summary: Queries the statistics on HTTP status codes of a website within a specified period of time.

DescribeDomainStatusCodeList.title: DescribeDomainStatusCodeList
DescribeDomainStatusCodeList.summary: Queries the statistics on HTTP status codes of a website.

DescribeDomainTopAttackList.title: DescribeDomainTopAttackList
DescribeDomainTopAttackList.summary: Queries the peak queries per second (QPS) information about a website, such as the attack QPS and total QPS, within a specific period of time.

DescribeDomainTopFingerprint.title: DescribeDomainTopFingerprint
DescribeDomainTopFingerprint.summary: Queries the information about the fingerprints of top N clients that access a website.

DescribeDomainTopHttpMethod.title: DescribeDomainTopHttpMethod
DescribeDomainTopHttpMethod.summary: Queries the information about top N HTTP methods of a website.

DescribeDomainTopReferer.title: DescribeDomainTopReferer
DescribeDomainTopReferer.summary: Queries the information about top N referers of a website.

DescribeDomainTopUserAgent.title: DescribeDomainTopUserAgent
DescribeDomainTopUserAgent.summary: Queries the information about top user agents of a website.

DescribeDomainViewSourceCountries.title: DescribeDomainViewSourceCountries
DescribeDomainViewSourceCountries.summary: Queries the areas and countries from which requests are sent to a website within a specified period of time.

DescribeDomainViewSourceProvinces.title: DescribeDomainViewSourceProvinces
DescribeDomainViewSourceProvinces.summary: Queries the administrative regions in China from which requests are sent to a website within a specified period of time.

DescribeDomainViewTopCostTime.title: DescribeDomainViewTopCostTime
DescribeDomainViewTopCostTime.summary: Queries the top N URLs that require the longest time to respond to requests within a specified period of time.

DescribeDomainViewTopUrl.title: DescribeDomainViewTopUrl
DescribeDomainViewTopUrl.summary: Queries the top N URLs that receive the most requests within a specified period of time.

DescribeDomains.title: DescribeDomains
DescribeDomains.summary: Queries domain names for which forwarding rules are created.

DescribeElasticBandwidthSpec.title: DescribeElasticBandwidthSpec
DescribeElasticBandwidthSpec.summary: Queries the available burstable protection bandwidths of an Anti-DDoS Proxy (Chinese Mainland) instance.

DescribeElasticQps.title: DescribeElasticQps
DescribeElasticQps.summary: Queries the line chart of the bills for the burstable QPS of an Anti-DDoS Proxy instance.

DescribeElasticQpsRecord.title: DescribeElasticQpsRecord
DescribeElasticQpsRecord.summary: Queries the burstable QPS details of an Anti-DDoS Proxy instance.

DescribeHeaders.title: DescribeHeaders
DescribeHeaders.summary: Queries the custom header that is specified for a domain name.

DescribeHealthCheckList.title: DescribeHealthCheckList
DescribeHealthCheckList.summary: Queries the Layer 4 or Layer 7 health check configurations of a port forwarding rule.

DescribeHealthCheckStatus.title: DescribeHealthCheckStatus
DescribeHealthCheckStatus.summary: Queries the health status of an origin server.

DescribeInstanceDetails.title: DescribeInstanceDetails
DescribeInstanceDetails.summary: Queries the IP addresses and Internet service provider (ISP) lines of Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instances.

DescribeInstanceExt.title: DescribeInstanceExt
DescribeInstanceExt.summary: Queries the information about Anti-DDoS Pro and Anti-DDoS Premium instances.

DescribeInstanceSpecs.title: DescribeInstanceSpecs
DescribeInstanceSpecs.summary: Queries the specifications of Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instances.

DescribeInstanceStatistics.title: DescribeInstanceStatistics
DescribeInstanceStatistics.summary: Queries the statistics on one or more Anti-DDoS Proxy instances, such as the numbers of protected domain names and ports.

DescribeInstanceStatus.title: DescribeInstanceStatus
DescribeInstanceStatus.summary: Queries the status of a specified Anti-DDoS Proxy instance.

DescribeL7GlobalRule.title: DescribeL7GlobalRule
DescribeL7GlobalRule.summary: Queries an Anti-DDoS global mitigation policy.

DescribeL7RsPolicy.title: DescribeL7RsPolicy
DescribeL7RsPolicy.summary: Queries the back-to-origin policies for the forwarding rule of a website.

DescribeL7UsKeepalive.title: DescribeL7UsKeepalive
DescribeL7UsKeepalive.summary: Queries the configuration of back-to-origin persistent connections of a domain name.

DescribeLayer4RulePolicy.title: DescribeLayer4RulePolicy
DescribeLayer4RulePolicy.summary: Queries the back-to-origin settings of a port forwarding rule.

DescribeLogStoreExistStatus.title: DescribeLogStoreExistStatus
DescribeLogStoreExistStatus.summary: Checks whether a Logstore is created for Anti-DDoS Proxy.

DescribeNetworkRegionBlock.title: DescribeNetworkRegionBlock
DescribeNetworkRegionBlock.summary: Queries the blocked locations that are configured for an Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance.

DescribeNetworkRuleAttributes.summary: Queries the mitigation settings of the port forwarding rule for a non-website service. The mitigation settings include session persistence and DDoS mitigation policies.

DescribeOpEntities.title: DescribeOpEntities
DescribeOpEntities.summary: Queries the operation logs of Anti-DDoS Proxy (Chinese Mainland).

DescribePort.title: DescribePort
DescribePort.summary: Queries the port forwarding rules that are created for an Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance.

DescribePortAttackMaxFlow.title: DescribePortAttackMaxFlow
DescribePortAttackMaxFlow.summary: Queries the peak attack traffic bandwidth and peak attack traffic packet rates of one or more Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instances within a specified period of time.

DescribePortAutoCcStatus.title: DescribePortAutoCcStatus
DescribePortAutoCcStatus.summary: Queries the configurations of the Intelligent Protection policy for non-website services.

DescribePortConnsCount.title: DescribePortConnsCount
DescribePortConnsCount.summary: The statistics on the connections established over the ports of one or more Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instances are queried.

DescribePortConnsList.title: DescribePortConnsList
DescribePortConnsList.summary: Queries the connections established over the ports of one or more Anti-DDoS Proxy instances.

DescribePortFlowList.title: DescribePortFlowList
DescribePortFlowList.summary: Queries the traffic data of one or more Anti-DDoS Proxy instances.

DescribePortMaxConns.title: DescribePortMaxConns
DescribePortMaxConns.summary: Queries the maximum number of connections that can be established over the ports of one or more Anti-DDoS Proxy instances.

DescribePortViewSourceCountries.title: DescribePortViewSourceCountries
DescribePortViewSourceCountries.summary: Queries the areas and countries from which requests are sent to one or more Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instances within the specified period of time.

DescribePortViewSourceIsps.title: DescribePortViewSourceIsps
DescribePortViewSourceIsps.summary: Queries the Internet service providers (ISPs) from which requests are sent to one or more Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instances within the specified period of time.

DescribePortViewSourceProvinces.title: DescribePortViewSourceProvinces
DescribePortViewSourceProvinces.summary: Queries the administrative regions in China from which requests are sent to one or more Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instances within a specified period of time.

DescribeSceneDefenseObjects.title: DescribeSceneDefenseObjects
DescribeSceneDefenseObjects.summary: Queries the protected objects of a scenario-specific custom policy.

DescribeSceneDefensePolicies.title: DescribeSceneDefensePolicies
DescribeSceneDefensePolicies.summary: Queries the configurations of a scenario-specific custom policy.

DescribeSchedulerRules.title: DescribeSchedulerRules
DescribeSchedulerRules.summary: Queries the scheduling rules of Sec-Traffic Manager.

DescribeSlaEventList.title: DescribeSlaEventList
DescribeSlaEventList.summary: Queries the destination rate limit events.

DescribeSlsAuthStatus.title: DescribeSlsAuthStatus
DescribeSlsAuthStatus.summary: Queries whether Anti-DDoS Proxy is authorized to access Simple Log Service.

DescribeSlsLogstoreInfo.title: DescribeSlsLogstoreInfo
DescribeSlsLogstoreInfo.summary: Queries information about the Logstore of the Anti-DDoS Proxy instance, such as the log storage capacity and log storage duration.

DescribeSlsOpenStatus.title: DescribeSlsOpenStatus
DescribeSlsOpenStatus.summary: Checks whether Simple Log Service is activated.

DescribeStsGrantStatus.summary: Queries whether Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium is authorized to access other cloud services.

DescribeSystemLog.summary: Queries the details of the bills for the burstable clean bandwidth.

DescribeTagKeys.title: DescribeTagKeys
DescribeTagKeys.summary: Queries all tag keys and the number of Anti-DDoS Proxy (Chinese Mainland) instances to which each tag key is added.

DescribeTagResources.title: DescribeTagResources
DescribeTagResources.summary: Queries the information about the tags that are added to an Anti-DDoS Proxy (Chinese Mainland) instance.

DescribeUdpReflect.title: DescribeUdpReflect
DescribeUdpReflect.summary: Queries the source ports of UDP traffic that are filtered out by the filtering policies for UDP reflection attacks on an Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance.

DescribeUnBlackholeCount.title: DescribeUnBlackholeCount
DescribeUnBlackholeCount.summary: Queries the total quota and remaining quota for blackhole filtering deactivation.

DescribeUnBlockCount.title: DescribeUnBlockCount
DescribeUnBlockCount.summary: Queries the total number and the remaining number of times that you can enable the near-origin traffic diversion feature.

DescribeWebAccessLogDispatchStatus.title: DescribeWebAccessLogDispatchStatus
DescribeWebAccessLogDispatchStatus.summary: Checks whether the log analysis feature is enabled for all domain names.

DescribeWebAccessLogEmptyCount.title: DescribeWebAccessLogEmptyCount
DescribeWebAccessLogEmptyCount.summary: Queries the remaining quota that allows you to clear the Logstore.

DescribeWebAccessLogStatus.title: DescribeWebAccessLogStatus
DescribeWebAccessLogStatus.summary: Queries the information about the log analysis feature for a website, such as the feature status and the Simple Log Service project and Logstore that are used.

DescribeWebAccessMode.summary: Queries the mode in which a website service is added to Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium.

DescribeWebAreaBlockConfigs.summary: Queries the Location Blacklist (Domain Names) configurations for websites.

DescribeWebCCRules.title: DescribeWebCCRules
DescribeWebCCRules.summary: Queries the custom frequency control rules that are created for a website.

DescribeWebCCRulesV2.title: DescribeWebCCRulesV2
DescribeWebCCRulesV2.summary: Queries the custom frequency control rules that are created for a website.

DescribeWebCacheConfigs.title: DescribeWebCacheConfigs
DescribeWebCacheConfigs.summary: Queries the Static Page Caching configuration of websites.

DescribeWebCcProtectSwitch.title: DescribeWebCcProtectSwitch
DescribeWebCcProtectSwitch.summary: Queries the status of each mitigation policy for a website.

DescribeWebCustomPorts.summary: Queries the supported custom ports of a website.

DescribeWebInstanceRelations.title: DescribeWebInstanceRelations
DescribeWebInstanceRelations.summary: Queries the information about Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instances to which a website service is added.

DescribeWebPreciseAccessRule.title: DescribeWebPreciseAccessRule
DescribeWebPreciseAccessRule.summary: Queries the accurate access control rules that are created for websites.

DescribeWebRules.title: DescribeWebRules
DescribeWebRules.summary: Query Configuration of Website Business Forwarding Rules.

DetachSceneDefenseObject.title: DetachSceneDefenseObject
DetachSceneDefenseObject.summary: Removes a protected object from a scenario-specific custom policy.

DisableWebAccessLogConfig.title: DisableWebAccessLogConfig
DisableWebAccessLogConfig.summary: Disables the log analysis feature for a website.

DisableWebCC.title: DisableWebCC
DisableWebCC.summary: Disables frequency control for a website.

DisableWebCCRule.title: DisableWebCCRule
DisableWebCCRule.summary: Disables custom frequency control rules for a website.

EmptyAutoCcBlacklist.title: EmptyAutoCcBlacklist
EmptyAutoCcBlacklist.summary: Clears the IP address blacklist of an Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance.

EmptyAutoCcWhitelist.title: EmptyAutoCcWhitelist
EmptyAutoCcWhitelist.summary: Clears the IP address whitelist of an Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance.

EmptySlsLogstore.summary: Clears the Logstore of Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium.

EnableWebAccessLogConfig.title: EnableWebAccessLogConfig
EnableWebAccessLogConfig.summary: Enables the log analysis feature for a website.

EnableWebCC.title: EnableWebCC
EnableWebCC.summary: Enables the Frequency Control policy for a website.

EnableWebCCRule.title: EnableWebCCRule
EnableWebCCRule.summary: Enables custom frequency control rules for a website.

ModifyBlackholeStatus.title: ModifyBlackholeStatus
ModifyBlackholeStatus.summary: Deactivates blackhole filtering that is triggered on an instance.

ModifyBlockStatus.title: ModifyBlockStatus
ModifyBlockStatus.summary: Modifies the Diversion from Origin Server configuration of an Anti-DDoS Proxy (Chinese Mainland) instance.

ModifyCnameReuse.title: ModifyCnameReuse
ModifyCnameReuse.summary: Enables or disables CNAME reuse for a website.

ModifyDomainResource.title: ModifyDomainResource
ModifyDomainResource.summary: Modifies the forwarding rule of a website.

ModifyElasticBandWidth.title: ModifyElasticBandWidth
ModifyElasticBandWidth.summary: Modifies the burstable protection bandwidth of a specified Anti-DDoS Proxy (Chinese Mainland) instance.

ModifyElasticBizQps.title: ModifyElasticBizQps
ModifyElasticBizQps.summary: Configures the burstable QPS and mode of an Anti-DDoS Proxy instance.

ModifyFullLogTtl.title: ModifyFullLogTtl
ModifyFullLogTtl.summary: Modifies the log storage duration for Anti-DDoS Proxy.

ModifyHeaders.title: ModifyHeaders
ModifyHeaders.summary: Modifies the custom header of a domain name that is added to an Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance.

ModifyHealthCheckConfig.title: ModifyHealthCheckConfig
ModifyHealthCheckConfig.summary: Modifies the Layer 4 or Layer 7 health check configuration of a port forwarding rule.

ModifyHttp2Enable.title: ModifyHttp2Enable
ModifyHttp2Enable.summary: Enables or disables HTTP/2 for the forwarding rule of a website.

ModifyInstance.title: ModifyInstance
ModifyInstance.summary: Instance adjustment, similar to BSS adjustment

ModifyInstanceRemark.title: ModifyInstanceRemark
ModifyInstanceRemark.summary: Modifies the description of an Anti-DDoS Proxy instance.

ModifyNetworkRuleAttribute.title: ModifyNetworkRuleAttribute
ModifyNetworkRuleAttribute.summary: Modifies the session persistence and DDoS mitigation policy settings of a port forwarding rule.

ModifyOcspStatus.title: ModifyOcspStatus
ModifyOcspStatus.summary: Specifies whether to enable the Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP) feature.

ModifyPortAutoCcStatus.title: ModifyPortAutoCcStatus
ModifyPortAutoCcStatus.summary: Modifies the Intelligent Protection configuration of a non-website service.

ModifyQpsMode.title: ModifyQpsMode
ModifyQpsMode.summary: Switches between the metering methods of the burstable clean bandwidth feature.

ModifySchedulerRule.title: ModifySchedulerRule
ModifySchedulerRule.summary: Modifies the scheduling rule of Sec-Traffic Manager.

ModifyTlsConfig.title: ModifyTlsConfig
ModifyTlsConfig.summary: Modifies the Transport Layer Security (TLS) policy configuration for the forwarding rule of a website.

ModifyWebAIProtectMode.title: ModifyWebAIProtectMode
ModifyWebAIProtectMode.summary: Changes the mode of the intelligent protection feature for a website.

ModifyWebAIProtectSwitch.title: ModifyWebAIProtectSwitch
ModifyWebAIProtectSwitch.summary: Enables or disables the Intelligent Protection policy for a website.

ModifyWebAccessMode.title: ModifyWebAccessMode
ModifyWebAccessMode.summary: Changes the mode in which a website service is added to Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium.

ModifyWebAreaBlock.summary: Modifies the blocked locations that are configured in the Location Blacklist (Domain Names) policy for a website.

ModifyWebAreaBlockSwitch.summary: Enables or disables the Location Blacklist (Domain Names) policy for a domain name.

ModifyWebCCGlobalSwitch.title: ModifyWebCCGlobalSwitch
ModifyWebCCGlobalSwitch.summary: Enables or disables the HTTP flood mitigation feature for a website.

ModifyWebCCRule.title: ModifyWebCCRule
ModifyWebCCRule.summary: Modifies the custom frequency control rule of a website.

ModifyWebCacheCustomRule.title: ModifyWebCacheCustomRule
ModifyWebCacheCustomRule.summary: Modifies the custom rule of the Static Page Caching policy for a website.

ModifyWebCacheMode.title: ModifyWebCacheMode
ModifyWebCacheMode.summary: Changes the cache mode of the Static Page Caching policy for a website.

ModifyWebCacheSwitch.title: ModifyWebCacheSwitch
ModifyWebCacheSwitch.summary: Enables or disables the Static Page Caching policy for a website.

ModifyWebIpSetSwitch.title: ModifyWebIpSetSwitch
ModifyWebIpSetSwitch.summary: Enables or disables the Black Lists and White Lists (Domain Names) policy for a domain name.

ModifyWebPreciseAccessRule.title: ModifyWebPreciseAccessRule
ModifyWebPreciseAccessRule.summary: Creates or modifies an accurate access control rule of a website.

ModifyWebPreciseAccessSwitch.title: ModifyWebPreciseAccessSwitch
ModifyWebPreciseAccessSwitch.summary: Enables or disables accurate access control for a website.

ModifyWebRule.title: ModifyWebRule
ModifyWebRule.summary: Modifies the forwarding rule of a website.

ReleaseInstance.title: ReleaseInstance
ReleaseInstance.summary: Releases an expired Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance.

SwitchSchedulerRule.title: SwitchSchedulerRule
SwitchSchedulerRule.summary: Switches service traffic to an Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance for scrubbing or switches service traffic back to the associated cloud resources.
